title: WeWork SoHo Presents Beauty Works
desc:
Clear your calendar - It's going down! WeWork SoHo Presents Beauty Works and you're invited to take part in the festivities. The Lounge (173 Lafayette Street) is our meeting spot for a night of fun and excitement. WeWork hosts some of the hottest and most innovative beauty start-ups in the world - our inaugural Beauty Works event provides a unique opportunity for brands to connect with media, buyers, and customers alike. Come one, come all, bring a guest, and hang loose. This is going to be epic! 
 
   
 Complimentary food and drinks!
